page.title: 11RECREATION IN TICKHILL
page.content: Although Tickhill has not got a{sports centre,it has a lot of sports facilities for people to use,such as football pitches,tennis courts,and a bowling green.People of all ages can do these,but you have to pay,but not for football.There is also a{cricket} ground,(for people over 15)and once a year,Yorkshire come to Tickhill to play them.Tickhill has just developed a new electronic score board.some of the most popular sports are{football, cycling,horse riding,and gymnastics. Gymnastics can be done at some schools after school time is over,as most schools have equipment.Tickhill also has a football club (Tickhill FC) which often plays other teams in the area.The schools also have football teams which play other teams in the area.
